Articles.Content: Should I report a post so that the mods know?
Well, that's strange.
Guys check the posts. They've changed.
This could still be a slight mistake. Is there anything that doesn't look right in it?

Erm, I think I missed something here.

ETA:

> 
> Guys check the posts. They've changed.

Ah.

I'm sorry but that last image was a little joke, I realized it was in bad taste and removed it. Apologies

However my patcher **DID** have 1.0 in the text someplace
What just happened? ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

> 
> Guys check the posts. They've changed.

Why did the version number change, but not the version?

> 
> Guys check the posts. They've changed.

EDIT:

Why you little...
Lol, I kinda expected that.

> 
> Wait, what?? What's going on here? Are they trying to cover this up?

It was a joke:

> 
> I'm sorry but that last image was a little joke, I realized it was in bad taste and removed it. Apologies
> However my patcher **DID** have 1.0 in the text someplace

> 
> I'm sorry but that last image was a little joke, I realized it was in bad taste and removed it. Apologies
> However my patcher **DID** have 1.0 in the text someplace

I did change the posts. it was a small joke that little image. Sorry for getting your hopes up.

I think it would show if a mod edited the posts, and I'm sure kenbob5588 would say if he didn't edit them himself.

EDIT:

Ninja'd
So he did a screenshot from a video or stream?

> 
> It was a joke:

Yeah, I just realized that...
Lol, I just told Kasper about it a moment ago and then told him nvm that it was a joke by a forumer.... lol
The forums are starting to get slow...
Well, on the bright side, this just let the thread gain several pages of hype, even if it was false hype.

Seems okayish to me.
What is this talk about "hours before release"? I thought it would only release tomorrow?
